metadata.title: CVE-2024-36011 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:Bluetooth: HCI: Fix potential null-ptr-deref Fix potential null-ptr-derefin hci_le_big_sync_established_evt().

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
